text: Haley Stevens (born June 24, 1983) is an American politician from the state of Michigan. She is a Democrat. She is a member of the United States House of Representatives from Michigan's 11th congressional district. Stevens was born in Rochester Hills, Michigan. In April 2025, Stevens announced her candidacy for Michigan's open U.S. Senate seat in the 2026 election. ==References== Category:1983 births Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:United States representatives from Michigan Category:People from Rochester Hills, Michigan Category:Living people
title: Haley Stevens
